name: Bazzite Portal Flatpak Builder
postCreateCommand: sudo dnf install -y flatpak flatpak-builder && flatpak remote-add --if-not-exists --user flathub https://flathub.org/repo/flathub.flatpakrepo && flatpak install -y --user org.gnome.Platform//48 org.gnome.Sdk//48 && chmod +x build-flatpak.sh && ./build-flatpak.sh && echo 'Flatpak exported to output/yafti-gtk.flatpak'
